org.petuum.jbosen.row.double_

Class DenseDoubleRowUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.petuum.jbosen.row.double_.DoubleColumnMap
      • org.petuum.jbosen.row.double_.DenseDoubleColumnMap
        • org.petuum.jbosen.row.double_.DenseDoubleRowUpdate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DoubleRowUpdate, RowUpdate

    public class DenseDoubleRowUpdate
extends DenseDoubleColumnMap
implements DoubleRowUpdate
    This implementation of DoubleRowUpdate assumes a dense set of columns, ie. they are contiguous values from 0 to capacity - 1. In general, this class is more CPU and memory efficient than SparseDoubleRowUpdate.
